name: PriMaze (TimRAGE90)
description:
A group project made in Game Production class in UCF. I was lucky enough to work alongside three talented minds going into game development, and together, created this fairly simple, yet ominous maze experience.

Fullscreen is recommended. Play with Keyboard + Mouse.

PLOT

   "You are a Monkey. Find Banana. Nothing else matters."

   Beware the Encouragement Device that will hunt you down if you get lost or take your time...

CODE

Joseph Demeritt

ART

Jacob Lalmansingh

Christian Babcock

TECH

Timothy Ray
